  ::Jhiaxus/Zarak/Scorponok::

use the puppet.

e G2 newcomer.

ing position with Zarak becoming the head. Scorponok walks into the base to=

  Scorponok: Lord Jhiaxus, I am Scorp=
onok; Headmaster warrior of the Generation 2 Decepticon Empire.

  Jhiaxus =
nods...

ike him I might ad.

dras:

hem
